column4: hi, I am new to ubuntu. My CPU is intel 64bits. Where can I find intel 64bits version of ubuntu? I can only find 32bit and amd64 versions. thanks.
Despite its name, the amd64 version of Ubuntu works on all x86 64-bit processors
cryptsetup is installed on the live cd, but on a default desktop install, I think it is only included if you have an encrypted home dir.
